channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SPARK-45252] `sbt doc` execution failed.
item.description:
run 

 

build/sbt clean doc -Phadoop-3 -Phadoop-cloud -Pmesos -Pyarn -Pkinesis-asl -Phive-thriftserver -Pspark-ganglia-lgpl -Pkubernetes -Phive -Pvolcano
